00058 typedef struct SceneStats {
00059     int totvert, totvertsel;
00060     int totedge, totedgesel;
00061     int totface, totfacesel;
00062     int totbone, totbonesel;
00063     int totobj, totobjsel;
00064     int totmesh, totlamp, totcurve;
00065 
00066     char infostr[512];
00067 } SceneStats;
00068 
00069 static void stats_object(Object *ob, int sel, int totob, SceneStats *stats)
00070 {
00071     switch (ob->type) {
00072         case OB_MESH: {
00073             /* we assume derivedmesh is already built, this strictly does stats now. */
00074             DerivedMesh *dm = ob->derivedFinal;
00075             int totvert, totedge, totface;
00076 
00077             stats->totmesh += totob;
00078 
00079             if (dm) {
00080                 totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00081                 totedge = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00082                 totface = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00083 
00084                 stats->totvert += totvert * totob;
00085                 stats->totedge += totedge * totob;
00086                 stats->totface += totface * totob;
00087 
00088                 if (sel) {
00089                     stats->totvertsel += totvert;
00090                     stats->totfacesel += totface;
00091                 }
00092             }
00093             break;
00094         }
00095         case OB_LAMP:
00096             stats->totlamp += totob;
00097             break;
00098         case OB_SURF:
00099         case OB_CURVE:
00100         case OB_FONT: {
00101             int tot = 0, totf = 0;
00102 
00103             stats->totcurve += totob;
00104 
00105             if (ob->disp.first)
00106                 count_displist(&ob->disp, &tot, &totf);
00107 
00108             tot *= totob;
00109             totf *= totob;
00110 
00111             stats->totvert += tot;
00112             stats->totface += totf;
00113 
00114             if (sel) {
00115                 stats->totvertsel += tot;
00116                 stats->totfacesel += totf;
00117             }
00118             break;
00119         }
00120         case OB_MBALL: {
00121             int tot = 0, totf = 0;
00122 
00123             count_displist(&ob->disp, &tot, &totf);
00124 
00125             tot *= totob;
00126             totf *= totob;
00127 
00128             stats->totvert += tot;
00129             stats->totface += totf;
00130 
00131             if (sel) {
00132                 stats->totvertsel += tot;
00133                 stats->totfacesel += totf;
00134             }
00135             break;
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00140 static void stats_object_edit(Object *obedit, SceneStats *stats)
00141 {
00142     if (obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00143         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00144 
00145         stats->totvert = em->bm->totvert;
00146         stats->totvertsel = em->bm->totvertsel;
00147         
00148         stats->totedge = em->bm->totedge;
00149         stats->totedgesel = em->bm->totedgesel;
00150         
00151         stats->totface = em->bm->totface;
00152         stats->totfacesel = em->bm->totfacesel;
00153     }
00154     else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00155         /* Armature Edit */
00156         bArmature *arm = obedit->data;
00157         EditBone *ebo;
00158 
00159         for (ebo = arm->edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next) {
00160             stats->totbone++;
00161             
00162             if ((ebo->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) && ebo->parent)
00163                 stats->totvert--;
00164             
00165             if (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL)
00166                 stats->totvertsel++;
00167             if (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL)
00168                 stats->totvertsel++;
00169             
00170             if (ebo->flag & BONE_SELECTED) stats->totbonesel++;
00171 
00172             /* if this is a connected child and it's parent is being moved, remove our root */
00173             if ((ebo->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) && (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL) && ebo->parent && (ebo->parent->flag & BONE_TIPSEL))
00174                 stats->totvertsel--;
00175 
00176             stats->totvert += 2;
00177         }
00178     }
00179     else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) { /* OB_FONT has no cu->editnurb */
00180         /* Curve Edit */
00181         Curve *cu = obedit->data;
00182         Nurb *nu;
00183         BezTriple *bezt;
00184         BPoint *bp;
00185         int a;
00186         ListBase *nurbs = curve_editnurbs(cu);
00187 
00188         for (nu = nurbs->first; nu; nu = nu->next) {
00189             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00190                 bezt = nu->bezt;
00191                 a = nu->pntsu;
00192                 while (a--) {
00193                     stats->totvert += 3;
00194                     if (bezt->f1) stats->totvertsel++;
00195                     if (bezt->f2) stats->totvertsel++;
00196                     if (bezt->f3) stats->totvertsel++;
00197                     bezt++;
00198                 }
00199             }
00200             else {
00201                 bp = nu->bp;
00202                 a = nu->pntsu * nu->pntsv;
00203                 while (a--) {
00204                     stats->totvert++;
00205                     if (bp->f1 & SELECT) stats->totvertsel++;
00206                     bp++;
00207                 }
00208             }
00209         }
00210     }
00211     else if (obedit->type == OB_MBALL) {
00212         /* MetaBall Edit */
00213         MetaBall *mball = obedit->data;
00214         MetaElem *ml;
00215         
00216         for (ml = mball->editelems->first; ml; ml = ml->next) {
00217             stats->totvert++;
00218             if (ml->flag & SELECT) stats->totvertsel++;
00219         }
00220     }
00221     else if (obedit->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00222         /* Lattice Edit */
00223         Lattice *lt = obedit->data;
00224         Lattice *editlatt = lt->editlatt->latt;
00225         BPoint *bp;
00226         int a;
00227 
00228         bp = editlatt->def;
00229         
00230         a = editlatt->pntsu * editlatt->pntsv * editlatt->pntsw;
00231         while (a--) {
00232             stats->totvert++;
00233             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) stats->totvertsel++;
00234             bp++;
00235         }
00236     }
00237 }
00238 
00239 static void stats_object_pose(Object *ob, SceneStats *stats)
00240 {
00241     if (ob->pose) {
00242         bArmature *arm = ob->data;
00243         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00244 
00245         for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00246             stats->totbone++;
00247             if (pchan->bone && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED))
00248                 if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer)
00249                     stats->totbonesel++;
00250         }
00251     }
00252 }
00253 
00254 static void stats_dupli_object(Base *base, Object *ob, SceneStats *stats)
00255 {
00256     if (base->flag & SELECT) stats->totobjsel++;
00257 
00258     if (ob->transflag & OB_DUPLIPARTS) {
00259         /* Dupli Particles */
00260         ParticleSystem *psys;
00261         ParticleSettings *part;
00262 
00263         for (psys = ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys = psys->next) {
00264             part = psys->part;
00265 
00266             if (part->draw_as == PART_DRAW_OB && part->dup_ob) {
00267                 int tot = count_particles(psys);
00268                 stats_object(part->dup_ob, 0, tot, stats);
00269             }
00270             else if (part->draw_as == PART_DRAW_GR && part->dup_group) {
00271                 GroupObject *go;
00272                 int tot, totgroup = 0, cur = 0;
00273                 
00274                 for (go = part->dup_group->gobject.first; go; go = go->next)
00275                     totgroup++;
00276 
00277                 for (go = part->dup_group->gobject.first; go; go = go->next) {
00278                     tot = count_particles_mod(psys, totgroup, cur);
00279                     stats_object(go->ob, 0, tot, stats);
00280                     cur++;
00281                 }
00282             }
00283         }
00284         
00285         stats_object(ob, base->flag & SELECT, 1, stats);
00286         stats->totobj++;
00287     }
00288     else if (ob->parent && (ob->parent->transflag & (OB_DUPLIVERTS | OB_DUPLIFACES))) {
00289         /* Dupli Verts/Faces */
00290         int tot = count_duplilist(ob->parent);
00291         stats->totobj += tot;
00292         stats_object(ob, base->flag & SELECT, tot, stats);
00293     }
00294     else if (ob->transflag & OB_DUPLIFRAMES) {
00295         /* Dupli Frames */
00296         int tot = count_duplilist(ob);
00297         stats->totobj += tot;
00298         stats_object(ob, base->flag & SELECT, tot, stats);
00299     }
00300     else if ((ob->transflag & OB_DUPLIGROUP) && ob->dup_group) {
00301         /* Dupli Group */
00302         int tot = count_duplilist(ob);
00303         stats->totobj += tot;
00304         stats_object(ob, base->flag & SELECT, tot, stats);
00305     }
00306     else {
00307         /* No Dupli */
00308         stats_object(ob, base->flag & SELECT, 1, stats);
00309         stats->totobj++;
00310     }
00311 }
00312 
00313 /* Statistics displayed in info header. Called regularly on scene changes. */
00314 static void stats_update(Scene *scene)
00315 {
00316     SceneStats stats = {0};
00317     Object *ob = (scene->basact) ? scene->basact->object : NULL;
00318     Base *base;
00319     
00320     if (scene->obedit) {
00321         /* Edit Mode */
00322         stats_object_edit(scene->obedit, &stats);
00323     }
00324     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00325         /* Pose Mode */
00326         stats_object_pose(ob, &stats);
00327     }
00328     else {
00329         /* Objects */
00330         for (base = scene->base.first; base; base = base->next)
00331             if (scene->lay & base->lay)
00332                 stats_dupli_object(base, base->object, &stats);
00333     }
00334 
00335     if (!scene->stats)
00336         scene->stats = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SceneStats), "SceneStats");
00337 
00338     *(scene->stats) = stats;
00339 }
00340 
00341 static void stats_string(Scene *scene)
00342 {
00343     SceneStats *stats = scene->stats;
00344     Object *ob = (scene->basact) ? scene->basact->object : NULL;
00345     uintptr_t mem_in_use, mmap_in_use;
00346     char memstr[64];
00347     char *s;
00348 
00349     mem_in_use = MEM_get_memory_in_use();
00350     mmap_in_use = MEM_get_mapped_memory_in_use();
00351 
00352     /* get memory statistics */
00353     s = memstr + sprintf(memstr, " | Mem:%.2fM", (double)((mem_in_use - mmap_in_use) >> 10) / 1024.0);
00354     if (mmap_in_use)
00355         sprintf(s, " (%.2fM)", (double)((mmap_in_use) >> 10) / 1024.0);
00356 
00357     s = stats->infostr;
00358     
00359     s += sprintf(s, "%s | ", versionstr);
00360 
00361     if (scene->obedit) {
00362         if (ob_get_keyblock(scene->obedit))
00363             s += sprintf(s, "(Key) ");
00364 
00365         if (scene->obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00366             if (scene->toolsettings->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX)
00367                 s += sprintf(s, "Ve:%d-%d | Ed:%d-%d | Fa:%d-%d",
00368                              stats->totvertsel, stats->totvert, stats->totedgesel, stats->totedge, stats->totfacesel, stats->totface);
00369             else if (scene->toolsettings->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)
00370                 s += sprintf(s, "Ed:%d-%d | Fa:%d-%d",
00371                              stats->totedgesel, stats->totedge, stats->totfacesel, stats->totface);
00372             else
00373                 s += sprintf(s, "Fa:%d-%d", stats->totfacesel, stats->totface);
00374         }
00375         else if (scene->obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00376             s += sprintf(s, "Ve:%d-%d | Bo:%d-%d", stats->totvertsel, stats->totvert, stats->totbonesel, stats->totbone);
00377         }
00378         else {
00379             s += sprintf(s, "Ve:%d-%d", stats->totvertsel, stats->totvert);
00380         }
00381 
00382         strcat(s, memstr);
00383     }
00384     else if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00385         s += sprintf(s, "Bo:%d-%d %s",
00386                      stats->totbonesel, stats->totbone, memstr);
00387     }
00388     else {
00389         s += sprintf(s, "Ve:%d | Fa:%d | Ob:%d-%d | La:%d%s",
00390                      stats->totvert, stats->totface, stats->totobjsel, stats->totobj, stats->totlamp, memstr);
00391     }
00392 
00393     if (ob)
00394         sprintf(s, " | %s", ob->id.name + 2);
00395 }
00396 
00397 void ED_info_stats_clear(Scene *scene)
00398 {
00399     if (scene->stats) {
00400         MEM_freeN(scene->stats);
00401         scene->stats = NULL;
00402     }
00403 }
00404 
00405 const char *ED_info_stats_string(Scene *scene)
00406 {
00407     if (!scene->stats)
00408         stats_update(scene);
00409     stats_string(scene);
00410 
00411     return scene->stats->infostr;
00412 }
